metadata.name: Arbitrary File Download Via GfxDownloadWrapper.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of GfxDownloadWrapper.exe with a URL as an argument to download file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\gfxdownloadwrapper.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://gameplayapi.intel.com/')))

output.summary: Detects execution of GfxDownloadWrapper.exe with a URL as an argument to download file.
